text: The Hangman Waits is a 1947 British thriller film directed by A. Barr Smith about a sadistic killer who works as an organist in an Eastbourne theatre. It stars Beatrice Campbell, John Turnbull, Anthony Baird and David Mowbray. ==References== ==External links== * Category:1947 films Category:British films Category:British thriller films
title: The Hangman Waits
